channel.title: Pages on Reid Mitchell
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Reid Mitchell

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Reid! I’m a software engineer living in San Francisco, CA. I’m passionate about building accessible, delightful experiences that enrich people’s lives, whether that’s through coding, storytelling, good design, or any other means. I grew up in a suburb of New York, and I attended Pomona College in Claremont, CA, where I majored in computer science and media studies. My pronouns are he/his. If you’d like to get in touch, you can find me on LinkedIn or maybe Twitter.
